0 = Not addressed: No code available or no mention of code.
1 = Partially addressed: Partial availability (scripts incomplete or without instructions).
2 = Fully addressed: Full public repository with all scripts and documentation.

0 = Not addressed: No validation performed or not described.

2 = Fully addressed: Use of public datasets and/or recognized benchmarks.
